channel.title: Data usage with comcast
channel.description:
Okay so question..
from what I have read on Google comcast has about 300gb data usage limit.
Now here is the thing..my dad streams movie (maybe two a day) , and well anybody who knows me knows I watch a crapload of porn xD...
so..my question is, is it possible to hit that 300gb of data within a month's time or what?

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:455052”]yep took a while but got a number to netflix. It is 720p :s

so in other words I will have to cut down on the porn! why must life be so unfair[/quote]
you could simply monitor the traffic your network uses and discover where you’re using it

Read full topic

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

yep took a while but got a number to netflix. It is 720p :s

so in other words I will have to cut down on the porn! why must life be so unfair

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:455052”][quote author=t4 link=topic=557919.msg4081693#msg4081693 date=1345423774]

Unless you watch 300+ movies a month doubtful.

i don’t know what the stream size for HD movies are, but a standard HD movie 720p encoded with H264 @ 20 is usually around 8-12GB. 1080p movies are 14-18GB.
[/quote]well my dad plans to subscribe to netflix next month are those movies HD or what?[/quote]
i believe they offer 720p streaming, check

Read full topic

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

300GB isn’t that much data. if you stream movies (hd) from services like netflix, hulu and the like, you’ll hit it in no time.

Read full topic

item.description:

speaking of porn… get on msn.

bahah! anyway, yeah it’s possible.

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You should be good… I’ve never had any issues. I’ve hear rumors of Comcast getting in trouble with the FCC for allowing torrenting and such, so just watch out.

Read full topic

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

nah streaming all. now I am downloading a few games like LOTRO(about 8gb)

item.title: Data usage with comcast
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I doubt it. Even if you do, they just slow you down, they won’t shut you off or anything. It also depends if your downloading all that porn or not.

Read full topic
